topic.title: Estimated Date Of Delivery Observation - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:444)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:445)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="11778-8" Estimated Date of Delivery (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:446)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:448)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value, where its data type is TS (CONF:450)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:444)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:445)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="11778-8" Estimated Date of Delivery (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:446)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:448)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value, where its data type is TS (CONF:450)
